product_name: Black Diamond Trail Back Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Black Diamond Trail Back trekking poles feature tough aluminum shafts for durable and stability, and double FlickLock adjustability for ease of use on the trail. Narrow-diameter aluminum shafts maximize strength while reducing swing weight. 3-section poles; patented FlickLocks hold length settings with zero slippage. Simply flick the lock open, set the length and flick the lock closed; lock is easy to operate even with gloves on. Ergonomic rubber grips and adjustable nylon wrist straps enhance comfort and support. Black Diamond Trail Back trekking poles feature low-profile trekking baskets, interchangeable powder baskets and long flex tips that help ensure traction in scree and snow.
short_description: The Black Diamond Trail Back trekking poles feature tough aluminum shafts for durable and stability, and double FlickLock adjustability for ease of use on the trail.
